mapper.insert:
insert into igams_zdh_jkwdjl(wdjlid,ybxxid,wd,sj)
select #{item.wdjlid},(select ybxxid from igams_zdh_ybxx where scbj='0' and zt!='80' and ybjbh= #{item.ybjbh} and bbbm=#{item.bbbm}),#{item.wd},cast(#{item.sj} as TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select wdjlid,ybxxid,wd,to_char(sj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') sj from igams_zdh_jkwdjl where ybxxid = #{ybxxid} order by sj desc
